Source.Name: mono-addins
Source.Summary: Mono.Addins is a generic framework for creating extensible applications.
Source.Description: Mono.Addins is a generic framework for creating extensible applications, and for creating add-ins which extend those applications. This framework has been designed to be useful for a wide range of applications: from simple applications with small extensibility needs, to complex applications which need support for large add-in structures.

Package.Name: mono-addins-devel
Package.Description: Mono.Addins is a generic framework for creating extensible applications, and for creating add-ins which extend those applications.
